heading: Today
text: Morning sun, the clouds arriving. Showers in NY midday, east, north of Rt. 4 to NH late. Breezy.

heading: Monday Night
text: Evening showers, some wet snow in the mountains late. Windy. Clearing south.0s

heading: Tuesday
text: Blustery, colder. Morning rain or snow showers northeast. Increasing sun from the south.
